MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DriverSize As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: Number of core and memory to be used for driver allocated in the specified Spark pool for the job, which will be used for overriding 'driverCores' and 'driverMemory' of the spark job definition you provide. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ExecutorSize As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: Number of core and memory to be used for executors allocated in the specified Spark pool for the job, which will be used for overriding 'executorCores' and 'executorMemory' of the spark job definition you provide. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ScanFolder As DataFactoryElement(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: Scanning subfolders from the root folder of the main definition file, these files will be added as reference files. The folders named 'jars', 'pyFiles', 'files' or 'archives' will be scanned, and the folders name are case sensitive. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
